Gloss: to die, perish; become lost; go astray
to grow up, become strong, become great
to be strong, become strong, have courage
to cut; cut off, exterminate (with _______ = to make a covenant)
to rule, reign, be king; become king
to pass over, pass by, move through
to send, send out, stretch out
to judge (mainly military sesne), pass judgement, rule
the relative pronoun (who, whom, which, that, where)
something holy, holiness, pl.: votive offerings
there is not/are not (particle of non-existance)
(prep.) in the middle of, in the midst of (see 7.6)
(prep.) on account of, for the sake of
(prep.) on, upon, on account of, over
